title: Ghost of Tsushima’s Reveal is a Month Late - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.15.20
description:
Greg and Blessing talk about how Ghost of Tsushima was supposed to be revealed last month, Xbox and Unreal Engine 5, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:06:02 - Housekeeping
Core Game Jam - kindafunny.com/gamejam - $100 to Extra Life for every game submitted.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Black Jack, Al Tribesman
The Roper Report   -
00:10:00 - Ghost of Tsushima’s Reveal is a Month Late
00:22:50 - Xbox on Unreal Engine 5
00:29:20 - Control’s Next DLC Explains More of Alan Wake, Reiner @ GI
00:41:00 - Three major DLCs for Nioh 2, Team Ninja’s Tom Lee
00:44:00 -  HIMS
00:46:00 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:48:00 - What fictional or historical cities, countries or worlds would you like to explore from a video game?  - Frankfurtter
00:54:40 - Thought on Ghost the day after - Quickjab/The Nano Biologist
01:06:39 - You‘re Wrong
